Packages that use mastodon.core

Classes in mastodon.core used by mastodon.algorithms
Algorithm
          This is the general layout that a pruning Algorithm has to follow.
BitTreeSystem
          This class contains methods for the manipulation of Trees using BitSets.
 

Classes in mastodon.core used by mastodon.core
Algorithm
          This is the general layout that a pruning Algorithm has to follow.
Arguments.ArgumentException
           
Arguments.IntegerOption
           
Arguments.Option
           
Arguments.RealOption
           
BitTree
          This class implements a BitSet implementation of a tree.
BitTreeSystem
          This class contains methods for the manipulation of Trees using BitSets.
Clade
          This object represents a tree clade using bitsets.
Launcher
          This class deals with processing input files and launching pruning algorithms in the GUI app.
RunResult
          An object that contains all relevant information about the results of a pruning algorithm run: pruning count upper and lower limits, the BitTreeSystem the run was carried out on, map of pruning frequencies of individual taxa, name of run, Lists (entry for each pruning set that resulted in the same MAP score) of pruned taxa as Taxon objects or BitSet, score ({MAP score, number of matching trees}) and the MAP tree with pruned nodes annotated.
 

Classes in mastodon.core used by mastodon.scoreCalculators
BitTree
          This class implements a BitSet implementation of a tree.
